SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTION_GETSITES
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION DBO.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTION_GETSITES (@INTERACTIONID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN (SELECT ID, SITEID--, --ISNULL(SUBDEPARTMENTID, NULL) as SUBDEPARTMENTID FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_INTERACTIONSITE WHERE INTERACTIONID = @INTERACTIONID and dbo.USR_UFN_UMHS_INTERACTION_ISPLANSTEP(USR_UMHS_INTERACTIONSITE.INTERACTIONID) = 0 )
